name: Kala Jamuns
description: A denser, richer version of the Gulab Jamuns, an Indian sweet(doughnuts soaked in flavored syrup)
recipeIngredient: 6-7 Tablespoons Raw sugar (raw sugar is sweeter than regular white varieties and makes a brown-ish syrup)
rose essence  (or rose water to taste or a few strands of saffron.)
2 Tablespoons nuts ground (I use 1 Tbsp cashew 1 Tbsp almond.)
2 tablespoons flour (whole wheat or all purpose or both)
1 Tablespoon ground raw sugar (1 Tablespoon more for sweeter spiral)
a generous pinch of baking powder
1 Tablespoon raw sugar ground (1 Tablespoon more for sweeter spiral)
1 tablespoons bread crumbs (heaping) (Coarse crumbs, lightly toasted . I used home made wheat bread)
A generous pinch of baking powder

itemListElement.text: For the sugar syrup, mix all ingredients in a deep pan(also wide enough to accommodate the jamuns) and bring to a boil. Keep simmering on low-medium till the syrup thickens a little(5-6 minutes). Add a few drops of rose essence. Take off heat if your jamuns are not ready.
itemListElement.name: For the sugar syrup, mix all ingredients in a deep pan(also wide enough to accommodate the jamuns) and bring to a boil. Keep simmering on low-medium till the syrup thickens a little(5-6 minutes). Add a few drops of rose essence. Take off heat if your jamuns are not ready.

itemListElement.text: Mix all the dry ingredients well.
itemListElement.name: Mix all the dry ingredients well.

itemListElement.text: Add the oil and water/almond milk and mix. mix to make a soft dough(dough might not be smooth). Use a little flour if needed. Let the dough sit covered for 5 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Add the oil and water/almond milk and mix. mix to make a soft dough(dough might not be smooth). Use a little flour if needed. Let the dough sit covered for 5 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Oil your hands, take a portion of the dough and make a 4-5 inch long rope and shape into a spiral.
itemListElement.name: Oil your hands, take a portion of the dough and make a 4-5 inch long rope and shape into a spiral.

itemListElement.text: Shallow fry on medium high heat, for 2-3 minutes each side in a thick bottom pan.(Oil should be atleast half the height of the spirals)
itemListElement.name: Shallow fry on medium high heat, for 2-3 minutes each side in a thick bottom pan.(Oil should be atleast half the height of the spirals)

itemListElement.text: Once done, gently immerse the spirals in simmering syrup. Flip after 2-3 minutes for even absorption.
itemListElement.name: Once done, gently immerse the spirals in simmering syrup. Flip after 2-3 minutes for even absorption.

itemListElement.text: Mix in all the dry ingredients well.
itemListElement.name: Mix in all the dry ingredients well.

itemListElement.text: Add oil and water and knead into a soft dough. Let dough rest for 2 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Add oil and water and knead into a soft dough. Let dough rest for 2 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Oil hands and shape into spirals. Place them on parchment lined baking sheet.
itemListElement.name: Oil hands and shape into spirals. Place them on parchment lined baking sheet.

itemListElement.text: Bake at preheated 375 degrees F for 12 minutes, them flip them upside down and bake for 5-6 minutes or more for a browner version.
itemListElement.name: Bake at preheated 375 degrees F for 12 minutes, them flip them upside down and bake for 5-6 minutes or more for a browner version.

itemListElement.text: Place the jamuns in simmering syrup. Flip after a minute.
itemListElement.name: Place the jamuns in simmering syrup. Flip after a minute.

itemListElement.text: Then remove from syrup after 1-2 minutes when syrup has been well absorbed. (absorption time will depend on how brown and hard the baked spirals are)
itemListElement.name: Then remove from syrup after 1-2 minutes when syrup has been well absorbed. (absorption time will depend on how brown and hard the baked spirals are)

itemListElement.text: Serve warm. Top with chopped pistachios.
itemListElement.name: Serve warm. Top with chopped pistachios.

keywords: Indian dessert, sugar syrup, vegan dessert
